sentences.sContent: Calumniating me is to calumniate your friend!
sentences.sContent_eng: Calumniating me is to calumniate your friend!
sentences.sCn: 诽谤我也就是诽谤你的朋友！

sentences.sContent: I have never seen people like you calumniate others like this!
sentences.sContent_eng: I have never seen people like you calumniate others like this!
sentences.sCn: 我从来没有见过像你这样中伤别人的人！

sentences.sContent: You do more, under the pretext of unmasking yourself, you calumniate yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: You do more, under the pretext of unmasking yourself, you calumniate yourself.
sentences.sCn: 尤其是，借口说您要暴露自己，您其实是在诽谤自己，这真可怕。
